title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.5 - Claims for reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.5 - Claims for reimbursement

State Regulations

Federal reimbursement of predetermination grants may be
claimed only after ADC categorical eligibility is established. State
reimbursement may be claimed by social services districts for all
predetermination grants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
382.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
